name: testing-logger
description: A logger specifically for use in test suites / harnesses.
author: Raynos <raynos2@gmail.com>

scripts.test: npm run jshint -s && npm run cover -s
scripts.vendor: cp node_modules/supports-color/index.js supports-color.js; sed -i '1s;^;// Copied from supports-color@1.3.1.\n;' supports-color.js;
scripts.cover: npr istanbul cover --report html --print detail -- test/index.js && npm run check-cover -s
scripts.travis: npm run cover -s && npr istanbul report lcov && ((cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls) || exit 0)
